section.p: ‘Will we have any trouble reaching Dweomer?’ you ask the skipper of the Taradiddle.
‘Not in this beauty,’ he says proudly. ‘Her mast’s of prime bluewood, and she always finds her way home.’
He is right; the voyage is blissfully uneventful. Remember to cross off the 35 Shards you had to pay for your passage, then .
